title: Fine White Powder
name: Calcium Lactate
description: A fine white powder. Very uniform texture. Appears chemical or medicinal.
purpose: Original ingredient in Sebastian's harmless elixir
reveals: Fortifying/health tonic. Shows Sebastian's intention to strengthen Cordelia.

character_interpretations.professor: Calcium lactate. Another pharmaceutical powder, finely processed. Someone combining botanicals with modern nutritional supplements. Strategic and knowledgeable approach.
character_interpretations.baker: Another unidentified powder. Chemistry work, not baking.
character_interpretations.heiress: More mysterious jars. I'm not interested.
character_interpretations.explorer: A fortifying supplement. The consistency suggests commercial pharmaceutical preparation. Shows deliberate health supplementation.
character_interpretations.fiduciary: Calcium lactate. Safe, nutritional. Common in 1920s supplements. Nothing suspicious.
character_interpretations.doctor: Calcium lactate. Used medically to improve calcium absorption. An excellent choice for fortification, particularly for women. Shows careful attention to health optimization.
